import math
t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    a=raw_input()
    a=a.split()
    for j in xrange(len(a)):
        a[j]=int(a[j])
    a=sorted(a)
    #print a
    lis=[]
    k=int(raw_input())
    if k==len(a):
        print "1"
    else:
        for j in range(len(a)-1,len(a)-k-1,-1):
            lis.append(a[j])
        #print lis
        val=a[j]
        #print j,val
        countin=0
        counttot=0
        for h in range(j,len(a)):
            if a[h]>val:
                break
            elif a[h]==val:
                countin+=1
        for h in xrange(len(a)):
            if(a[h]==val):
                counttot+=1
        #print countin,counttot
        print math.factorial(counttot)/((math.factorial(countin)*(math.factorial(counttot-countin))))
